title: The Adorable Sheep Met The Wolf - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Shoujo   Supernatural
tags: Amnesia   Ancient China   Assassins   Average-looking Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Fat Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Generals   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Medical Knowledge   Modern Knowledge   Polyandry   Possessive Characters   Reverse Harem   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transported to Another World
author: 木天涯
description: This is a world in which the proportion of men and women is seriously out of balance, and it is the woman’s status esteem that bears responsibility for generations. When Yang Mianmian appeared in the wolves, her chubby face and soft temperament let the wolves know that this was a fat and delicious and arbitrarily stupid sheep.>
